it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action

Class YieldAndProductAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action.Action
        • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action.YieldAndProductAction

  • public class YieldAndProductAction
extends Action
    Class that represents a yield or a product action, in other words the action done when the player positions his familiars in the yield or in the produce positions. This class also represents a bonus action of the same kind
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Detail

      • YieldAndProductAction

        public YieldAndProductAction(ActionType type,
                             Familiar familiar,
                             java.util.List<YieldAndProductPosition> tablePosition,
                             YieldAndProductPosition firstPosition)
        Constructor for a normal action
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the action
        familiar - The familiar to position
        tablePosition - The list of the other yield or product positions in table
        firstPosition - The first yield or product position in the table (For default game, is that has no malus)
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player hasn't enough resources

      • YieldAndProductAction

        public YieldAndProductAction(ActionType type,
                             Player player,
                             java.util.List<YieldAndProductPosition> tablePosition,
                             YieldAndProductPosition firstPosition,
                             int actionValue,
                             int actionIncrement)
        Constructor for bonus action
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the action
        player - The interested player
        tablePosition - The list of the other yield or product positions in table
        firstPosition - The first yield or product position in the table (For default game, is that has no malus)
        actionValue - The value of the bonus action
        actionIncrement - The increment the player wants for this action
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player hasn't enough resources

    • Method Detail

      • checkAction

        public Response checkAction()
        Method used to check the correctness of the action
        Specified by:
        checkAction in class Action
        Returns:
        A response which represents the Success/Failure of the method: SUCCESS for a successful control, FAILURE for a generic problem, LOW_LEVEL if the player hasn't enough resources, CANNOT_PLAY if the player can not play this action

      • canStay

        private boolean canStay()
        Private method use to know if the player can position in the first position
        Returns:
        True if the specified position has a lower level than the action value, False if the position has a higher level than then the action value, otherwise return the value of checkOtherPosition()

      • checkOtherPositions

        private boolean checkOtherPositions()
        Private method used to verify if the player can position in the other positions
        Returns:
        True if the specified position has a lower level than the action value and if there isn't other current player's familiars (apart the neutral), otherwise False

      • checkLevel

        private Response checkLevel()
        Control the level of the first free position
        Returns:
        SUCCESS if the firstFreePosition level is lower than the action value, otherwise False

      • getFirstFreePosition

        private YieldAndProductPosition getFirstFreePosition()
        Method used to have the first free position from the tablePosition list
        Returns:
        The first free position in table
        Throws:
        EmptyException - If there isn't another free position, it is a fatal error

      • doAction

        public void doAction()
        Method used to apply the action
        Specified by:
        doAction in class Action
